title: Out of the Woodland
description: Charlotte and her brother Thomas live in the Cotswolds, England with their dog Edward and pony Crackers. During the summer of 2018, it was unusually hot, and their adventure takes them past Mr Tarrant’s fields to the woodland which grows beside the river Windrush.Here they meet new friends, both real and mythical. The mythical creatures take them on a journey of curiosity and discovery.Wonderfully illustrated and easy to follow ‘Out of the Woodland’ immerses the reader in a world of animal and bio-wonders, bridging the real and the imagined. This children’s book with traditional undertones will both delight and enthrall the reader.
author: Alexandra Kettles
